---
description: Manage your existing licensees.
---

# Enable or Disable Licensee

Account administrators can enable or disable a licensee from the licensee's details page.&#x20;

Once you disable a licensee, you can’t select it when creating new agreements or ordering subscriptions.

### Enabling or disabling a licensee

To enable or disable a licensee:

1. Navigate to the **Licensees** page.
2. Find the licensee to enable or disable.&#x20;
3. Complete one of the following steps:
   * Select the actions icon (**•••**), then choose **Enable** or **Disable**.&#x20;
   * Select the licensee on the **Licensees** page. Then, on the licensee details page, select the arrow <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">and choose **Enable** or **Disable**. The following image shows the **Disable** option.&#x20;

<div data-with-frame="true"><figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (1013).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>The option to disable a licensee.</p></figcaption></figure></div>

The licensee is enabled or disabled, depending on your chosen action, and a confirmation message is displayed. You can view the updated status on the **Licensees** page.
